title: Wanting Appeal
body:
**(Originally posted on NA Boards so i figured id re-post here as it seemed logical, I've also linked the original post to view previous responses)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/fv6wNIly-wanting-appeal** for some reason the post was deleted or something, not quite sure.

not sure if I'm posting this in the right place so please point me in the right direction if possible, cheers.

Title sums it up, i feel as if i was unfairly muted.

Here's the context:

Game 1
In-Game
Kamu Monyet: wtf are you all doing though, honestly
Kamu Monyet: like youve all just talked and inted all game
Kamu Monyet: yes blame the only lane not inting for your mistakes, muted
Kamu Monyet: do you even know what projecting mean, ill save your the time. NO YOU DONT
Kamu Monyet: nah they all wont stop typing
Kamu Monyet: the 3 of them literally afk typing all game
Kamu Monyet: dudes playing rengar top complain about amad mathcup YIKES
Kamu Monyet: ?????????
Kamu Monyet: ?????????????
Kamu Monyet: chance for what?
Kamu Monyet: you ignored bot all game and inted
Kamu Monyet: how if taking scuttle helping botlane
Kamu Monyet: honestly gl with your next game
Kamu Monyet: i cannot talk to you, this is pathetic
Kamu Monyet: so toxic
Kamu Monyet: thse 3 saying they gonna keep me hostige then saying let them end so they afk at base
Kamu Monyet: pls report mid top jg for greifing
Kamu Monyet: ????????????????????

I was only given one example of poor communication and this is it. I don't see how defending myself passively is a fair reason to be muted. Three of my team typed all game which is why i said "wtf are you all doing though honestly" this message was around mid game (15 minutes when ff vote failed because of me) and by this point they had all fed all game and they got offended then grouped up and flamed me because one:i asked if they could stop talking and play and two: because i didn't ff at 15.what's the point of the option to vote no if you use it then get flamed and muted/punished.

Any help is appreciated, thanks.

replies.body: Meh, it sucks but it happens. Also asking for X player to be reported is considered an offence so that doesn't help.

You say your team was chatting, int'ing and wanted to 'ff' at 15 and you voted no.....

whats a mad math cup?
